# Residential, Luxury
## Overview
**Residential, Luxury:** As the [[Residential, Fancy|fancy residential]] above, but thirty people live in the lap of opulent luxury.

*Components:* [[Bedrooms, Luxury|Luxury bedrooms]] (15), [[Dining Hall, Luxury|luxury dining hall]], [[Kitchen, Luxury|luxury kitchen]], [[Bath, Luxury|luxury bath]], [[Servants' Quarters|servantsâ€™ quarters]] (4); *Size:* 40 stronghold spaces; *Cost:* 411,600 gp.

*Staff:* Cooks (6), servants (3), valets (16); *Upkeep:* 123 gp per month.
